Dear cantera users/developers,

sin=
ce some time I am struggling with a Cantera/Matlab interface problem
that h=
as been previously discussed here without reasonable outcome.
Maybe some of=
 you know better today and can help me.

My intention is to compute a multi=
phase equilibrium under Matlab (I need
to use Matlab to integrate the simul=
ation in an existing model), but
always the same MEX-file error occurs (The=
 error has been thoroughly
described in this thread before). 

Meanwhile I =
have tried several Matlab/Cantera configurations but even
under newest Matl=
ab 7.4 and Cantera 1.7 the problem is still existent.
For installation of a=
ll cantera versons I have always used the provided
binary installers.

by Pro=
f. Goodwin before (closely following the instruction in the
documentation).=

problem with=

how MATLAB Cantera =
MEX

recomme=
nd building Cantera

lopment version
(CVS) of Cantera

just wait a day or so until
Cantera 1.7.0 is released,

errors than MATLA=
